articles.title: Biden calls out Musk over a published report that the Tesla CEO once worked in the US illegally - The Associated Press
articles.description: President Joe Biden has slammed Elon Musk for hypocrisy on immigration after a published report that the Tesla CEO once worked illegally in the United States. The South Africa-born Musk denies the allegation. Biden criticized Musk during a campaign stop in Pi…
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) President Joe Biden slammed Elon Musk for hypocrisy on immigration after a published report that the Tesla CEO once worked illegally in the United States. The South Africa-born Musk den… [+1908 chars]
